import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Coin.css' import { Button } from 'web3uikit' function Coin({ perc, setPerc, token }) { const [color, setColor] = useState() useEffect(() => { perc < 50 ? setColor('#C43D08') : setColor('green') }, [perc]) return ( <>
{token}
{perc}%
) } export default Coin
